sentences.en: The white sails billow with the breezes they catch.
An angry billow almost swallowed that ship.
sentences.cn: 怒涛几乎吞没了那艘船。

sentences.en: Remember to clear concertina sections out when you come back from trips to avoid your unwashed briefs billow out onto the boardroom table.
sentences.cn: 记得出差回来清空检查一下手风琴夹层，避免在会议上找文件时把你未洗的短内裤抖出来。
